promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special gecko dark-type pokemon wearing galaxy-pattern gemstones. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Galaxynite, a a gigantic special gecko dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Puncturing Fangs. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "dark" or "Galaxynite". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, gecko-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: A cosmic reptile lurks in crypt-like hollows. Its space-themed form harnesses Puncturing Fangs, prominent in nocturnal hunts.
